definition: "yellow wine" (mulled rice wine, usually served warm)
realgar wine (traditionally drunk during the Dragon Boat Festival 端午節|端午节[Duan1 wu3 jie2])

sentences.english: Majoring in yellow wine, the group is actively developing its relevant extended products.

sentences.english: The water used in making yellow wine is from Jianhu, where water is quality.

sentences.english: Rice wine, as the Chinese wine, has the characteristic aroma and style.
sentences.chinese: 黃酒是中國的國酒，它的香味獨特，自成風格。

sentences.english: People drink realgar wine to protect themselves from illness .
sentences.chinese: 大部分人喝雄黃酒保護本人免於生病。

sentences.english: People also call Shaoxing wine "Aged Wine".

sentences.english: If the illness needs, usable a few tepid yellow rice or millet wine are irruptive take.

sentences.english: Old Red-Nosed Gong lifted the bowl of yellow wine in his hand.

sentences.english: Kohlrabi and Yellow Rice Wine are both special products in Xiang Fan.

sentences.english: I enjoy drinking realgar wine during the festival.

sentences.english: Accordingly, such method could be used to distinguish yellow rice wine made by Jinfeng Co. Ltd. from other yellow rice wine products (made by other wineries).
sentences.chinese: 以此可以初步區分金楓公司和其他公司的黃酒產品。

sentences.english: The researches of volatile and non-volatile compounds in Chinese rice wine were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 簡要回顧了中國黃酒風味成分分析的歷史與現狀。

definition: Shaoxing wine a.k.a. "yellow wine", traditional Chinese wine made from glutinous rice and wheat
